    public class MessageContextGlobalSystem
extends com.ibm.cloud.sdk.core.service.model.GenericModel
    Built-in system properties that apply to all skills used by the assistant.

    • Method Detail

      • getTimezone

        public java.lang.String getTimezone()
        Gets the timezone. The user time zone. The assistant uses the time zone to correctly resolve relative time references.
        Returns:
        the timezone

      • getUserId

        public java.lang.String getUserId()
        Gets the userId. A string value that identifies the user who is interacting with the assistant. The client must provide a unique identifier for each individual end user who accesses the application. For Plus and Premium plans, this user ID is used to identify unique users for billing purposes. This string cannot contain carriage return, newline, or tab characters.
        Returns:
        the userId

      • getTurnCount

        public java.lang.Long getTurnCount()
        Gets the turnCount. A counter that is automatically incremented with each turn of the conversation. A value of 1 indicates that this is the the first turn of a new conversation, which can affect the behavior of some skills (for example, triggering the start node of a dialog).
        Returns:
        the turnCount

      • setTimezone
